resources.string:
Welcome to the Codecool Application! We are excited to see you here! Now that you signed up on our website there are a few more steps you must do if you want to be a Codecooler. 

First things first, we have rules and you must accept them before you continue. 
We have two tests for you. Since english is crucial when it comes to programming, we would like to know your skills on that field. There's another test, which will give us more insight on your logical thinking. Make sure to do your best when completing, some questions might be tricky! 

Right after you completed our Acceptance Criteria and the two tests you must prodive a bit more information about you. To do so, head over to the introduction page and select what kind of introduction you prefer. Your best shot is to make a shrort video intro about yourself! 

After you created your introduction you can submit your application to Codecool. 

Looking forward to hear more from you! 

The Staff
Please write your textual introduction here. When you\'re ready just hit the submit button below.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Huic mori optimum esse propter desperationem sapientiae, illi propter spem vivere. Haec quo modo conveniant, non sane intellego. Quae qui non vident, nihil umquam magnum ac cognitione dignum amaverunt. Duo Reges: constructio interrete. Sed eum qui audiebant, quoad poterant, defendebant sententiam suam.

English Huic mori optimum esse propter desperationem sapientiae, illi propter spem vivere. Haec quo modo conveniant, non sane intellego. Quae qui non vident, nihil umquam magnum ac cognitione dignum amaverunt. Duo Reges: constructio interrete. Sed eum qui audiebant, quoad poterant, defendebant sententiam suam. Iam id ipsum absurdum, maximum malum neglegi.

Logic Quasi ego id curem, quid ille aiat aut neget. Teneo, inquit, finem illi videri nihil dolere. Hoc est non dividere, sed frangere. Illa videamus, quae a te de amicitia dicta sunt. Quid de Platone aut de Democrito loquar? Potius inflammat, ut coercendi magis quam dedocendi esse videantur. Quae ista amicitia est? Ad quorum et cognitionem et usum iam corroborati natura ipsa praeeunte deducimur.

Your application has been successfully submitted and we got everything we need from you right now. We'll get back to you in a few days so stay tuned: keep an eye on your inbox! 

In the meantime feel free to read more about the school and our fellow students: https://codecool.hu/blog 

The Staff
This Page Is Not Yet Available

You must complete the tests in order. First make sure to go through on our Acceptance Criteria. After that the English Test will unlock and upon successful completion you can complete the Logic Test as well. Don\'t forget to introduce yourself! Without an introduction submitting your application is not possible!
You failed a test which means you cannot be a Codecooler, sorry. You should try looking into something else!
There\'s no need to complete the same survey again, you have already done that. You\'re on the right track! Go ahead, complete your application, we are waiting for your submission!

Now that you completed all the tests and created your introduction profile, only one thing left: submit your application. This is the last chance to modify your introduction, so make sure you done it the way you wanted! Simply hit the button below to Submit your application to Codecool.

If you are about to upload an introduction video along with your application you just created with your camera (or a file that you selected from your storage) you should be on WiFi or a large data plan before you hit Submit.

Now that you have completed the tests, it\'s time to tell a few words about yourself! You have a few options here. You can upload a YouTube video URL, create a video using your smartphone\'s camera or if you like the oldschool way go with a textual introduction. Make sure to be short and tell us about why you want to be a Codecooler!
